name: Super Skeleboy
description:
Super Skeleboy is a style study minigame in the style of Benal's delightful Super Skeleman, also available here on itch. Play as Skeleboy, find some teeth, and make your way out of the tomb into the world beyond!

Keyboard Controls:

Move / Fall through platforms: Arrow keys

Jump: Z / Up Arrow

Action: X

Restart: R

XB360 Gamepad Controls:

Move / Fall through platforms: Left analog stick

Jump: A

Action: X

Restart: Right bumper
